Huguette Bello (Amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1950) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị French si Réunion.
Onye bụbu onye otu Reunionese Communist Party (PCR), ọ kewara na ndị Kọmunist n'afọ 2012 wee guzobe otu nke ya, For Réunion (French: Pour la Réunion, PLR).

Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya na French National Assembly, ebe ọ na-anọdụ na Gauche démocrate et républicaine (Democratic and Republican Left) otu ndị omeiwu, nke gụnyere French Communist Party (PCF) na ndị nnọchi anya ndị ọzọ

Ọ bụbu onye otu ndị omeiwu Radical-Citizen-Green (Radical-citoyen-vert (fr)) site n'afọ 1997 ruo afọ 2002, nke gụnyere, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, Reunionese Communist Party, Greens, na Radical-Socialists, mana ọ bụghị PCF.
